00035 class pciVendor
00036 {
00037 private:
00038   std::string code;
00039   std::string name;
00040   std::vector<pciDevice*> kid_list; // hold devices of the vendor
00041   
00042 public:
00043   pciVendor(std::string vCode, std::string vName) : code(vCode), name(vName)
00044   {
00045   }
00046 
00047   ~pciVendor();
00048   
00049   void add_kid(pciDevice* kid)
00050   {
00051     kid_list.push_back(kid);
00052   }
00053 
00054   std::string get_code (void) const
00055   {
00056     return code;
00057   }
00058 
00059   std::string get_name (void) const
00060   {
00061     return name;
00062   }
00063 
00064   int store_db (void);

00066 };

00068 class pciDevice
00069 {
00070 private:
00071   pciVendor* parent_vendor;
00072   std::string code, name;
00073   std::vector<pciSubsystem*> subsystem_list; // hold subsystems of the device
00074 
00075 public:
00076   pciDevice(pciVendor* dParent, std::string dCode, std::string dName) : parent_vendor(dParent), code(dCode), name(dName)
00077   {
00078     dParent->add_kid(this);
00079   }
00080 
00081   ~pciDevice();
00082 
00083   void add_subsystem(pciSubsystem* subsystem)
00084   {
00085     subsystem_list.push_back(subsystem);
00086   }
00087 
00088   std::string get_code (void) const
00089   {
00090     return code;
00091   }
00092 
00093   std::string get_name (void) const
00094   {
00095     return name;
00096   }
00097 
00098   const pciVendor* const get_parent (void) const
00099   {
00100     return parent_vendor;
00101   }
00102 
00103   friend int pciVendor::store_db(void);
00104     
00105 };

00108 {
00109 private:
00110   pciDevice* parent_device;
00111   std::string subvendor, subdevice, name;
00112 
00113 public:
00114   pciSubsystem(pciDevice* sParent, std::string sVendor, std::string sDevice, std::string sName) : parent_device(sParent), subvendor(sVendor), subdevice(sDevice), name(sName)
00115   {
00116     sParent->add_subsystem(this);
00117   }
00118 
00119   std::string get_subVendor (void) const

00122   }
00123
